title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Celtics/Heat ECF Gm. 7 Reaction, Finals Preview
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Celtics/Heat ECF Gm. 7 Reaction, Finals Preview
description:
Colin reacts to the Celtics Eastern Conference Finals Game 7 win over the Heat (3:00). Then, Doug Gottlieb (Doug Gottlieb Show) joins Colin to break down Game 7 (9:00), if the Celtics have enough offense to hang with the Warriors (12:00), how the less heralded college players are crucial to both Finals teams (27:00), and how Marcus Smart and Draymond fill similar roles (31:00). They also discuss the Lakers hiring Darvin Ham as their head coach, if he has any chance to lead a quick turnaround next season (35:00), and if Jimmy Butler is a true NBA superstar (53:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
